DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect eleclazine ( GS-6615 ) exercise capacity , quality life , safety tolerability eleclazine participant symptomatic hypertrophic cardiomyopathy ( HCM ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Eleclazine ( GS-6615 ) Exercise Capacity Subjects With Symptomatic Hypertrophic Cardiomyopathy
DOC.criteria: Key Established diagnosis hypertrophic cardiomyopathy define standard criterion maximal leave ventricular wall thickness ≥ 15 mm initial diagnosis Exertional symptom include least one follow : New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) Class ≥ II dyspnea Canadian Cardiovascular Society ( CCS ) Class ≥ II angina Screening ( baseline ) peak VO2 < 80 % predicted age , sex , weight Ability perform upright treadmill cardiopulmonary exercise test ( CPET ) Key Known aortic valve stenosis ( moderate severe ) Known coronary artery disease Left ventricular systolic dysfunction ( ejection fraction < 50 % ) Recent septal reduction procedure ( ie , surgical myectomy alcohol septal ablation ) within six month prior screen procedure schedule occur study Note : Other protocol define Inclusion/Exclusion criterion may apply .
